item.ascended_quark.blue_swet_in_a_skyro: Blue Swet In A Skyroot Bucket
item.ascended_quark.golden_swet_in_a_sky: Golden Swet In A Skyroot Bucket
lore.block.ascended_quark.aerogel_vertic: Crafted from Aerogel. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.aether_dirt_br: Used as a building material native to the Aether. It is made from Aether Dirt and is sturdier than it too.
Crafted from Aether Dirt Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Aether Dirt Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Aether Dirt Bricks. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
Crafted from Aether Dirt Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defenses. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.ascended_quark.aether_mud_bri: Crafted from Aether Mud Bricks. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.ambrosium_lamp: A lamp made out of Holystone and Ambrosium. Ambrosium Blocks can increase its light up to 4 times.
lore.block.ascended_quark.angelic_vertic: Crafted from Angelic. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.aseterite_bric: Crafted from Aseterite Bricks. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.aseterite_vert: Crafted from Aseterite. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.big_holystone_: Crafted from Big Holystone Bricks. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.blue_berry_cra: A handy crate for storing blue berries! A very good decoration block!
lore.block.ascended_quark.blue_roseroot_: Crafted from Blue Roseroot Leaf. Leaf Carpets are a great way to add natural elements to your builds!
lore.block.ascended_quark.clorite_vertic: Crafted from Clorite. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.conberry_ladde: Ladders made out of Conberry! Much better decoration than plain ol' stairs...
lore.block.ascended_quark.conberry_leaf_: Crafted from Conberry Leaf. Leaf Carpets are a great way to add natural elements to your builds!
lore.block.ascended_quark.conberry_post: Crafted from Conberry. These are slim log style blocks you can lay down vertically or horizontally. Chains and lanterns can also connect to them.
lore.block.ascended_quark.conberry_verti: Crafted from Conberry. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.cruderoot_ladd: Ladders made out of Cruderoot! Much better decoration than plain ol' stairs...

lore.block.ascended_quark.flowering_rose: Crafted from Flowering Roseroot Leaf. Leaf Carpets are a great way to add natural elements to your builds!

lore.block.ascended_quark.hollow_conberr: Can be crafted with four Hollow Conbe Logs. You can sneak into them horizontally, and climb inside of them vertically!
lore.block.ascended_quark.hollow_crudero: Can be crafted with four Hollow Cruder Logs. You can sneak into them horizontally, and climb inside of them vertically!
lore.block.ascended_quark.hollow_roseroo: Can be crafted with four Hollow Roser Logs. You can sneak into them horizontally, and climb inside of them vertically!

lore.block.ascended_quark.hollow_yagroot: Can be crafted with four Hollow Yagr Logs. You can sneak into them horizontally, and climb inside of them vertically!
lore.block.ascended_quark.holystone_bric: Crafted from Holystone Brick. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.holystone_furn: A versatile furnace that can also use Ambrosium as fuel. Also looks fancier in white.

lore.block.ascended_quark.quicksoil_fram: Combine Iron Ingots and Quicksoil Glass, and you get yourself some fancy Quicksoil Framed Glass. Great for some more rustic or medieval builds.
A thin decorative variant of Quicksoil Framed Glass. Great for some more rustic or medieval builds.

lore.item.ascended_quark.ambrosium_torch: An arrow tied to an Ambrosium Torch. It imbues the healing properties of Ambrosium, and places the torch on impact.
lore.item.ascended_quark.blue_swet_in_a_: Seems like you caught a Blue Swet! Not that useful, but it's an easy way to transport them. They might get excited too!
Seems like you caught a Blue Swet! Not that useful, but it's an easy way to transport them. They might get excited too!

Seems like you caught a Golden Swet! Not that useful, but it's an easy way to transport them. They might get excited too!
lore.item.ascended_quark.quicksoil_glass: Apparently something broke. You can still use some of the shards to craft the glass again.
